title: Unveiling Venus
description: Mary Adams continues her journey through Victorian society â€“ now as the much-admired Persephone Lavelle. From lavish Venetian balls to luxurious Mayfair townhouses, she gets a glimpse into the most glamorous lives of the age. When she meets a mysterious Harlequin she has the chance to rise to the very top, but to do so she must betray someone close ...
author: Sophia Bennett
